name: game-bucket
description: Common game utilities + rollup config, suitable for a small game competition. Like [JS13k](http://js13kgames.com/)!

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs bundle.js --compress --mangle -o bundle.min.js && mv -f bundle.min.js bundle.js
scripts.optimize-images: for f in assets/m05-short.png assets/tiles.png; do convert $f PNG8:"$f"8 && mv -f "$f"8 ${f%.*}.png; done;
scripts.zip: rm -rf game.zip && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run uglify && npm run optimize-images && zip -X -r game.zip index.html bundle.js assets/*.png assets/*.svg && ls -lah game.zip && echo $(echo "$(wc -c < game.zip) - 13312" | bc) bytes remain
